title: 7-Eleven is ‘Back’ as Uno-X Goes Retro with Throwback Kits at Liège-Bastogne-Liège
content:
Uno-X Mobility is pushing special-edition, one-off looks to new levels with a 7-Eleven-inspired kit and a special-edition Ridley that also pay homage to Eddy Merckx.

Read the full article at 7-Eleven is ‘Back’ as Uno-X Goes Retro with Throwback Kits at Liège-Bastogne-Liège on Velo.
author: ahood
